articles.title: Krispy Kreme sets doughnut prices to $4.11 average gas price Wednesday to offer inflation relief - USA TODAY
articles.description: Gas prices might be lower after the record March highs but Krispy Kreme, Dunkin' and Bojangles are providing consumers with additional gas relief.
articles.content:
Update: Krispy Kreme will have a doughnut deal every Wednesday through May 4. The price of a dozen will change.
After record-high gas prices in March, there is finally some relief at the pump. 
And… [+3447 chars]
